title: The Blank Canvas, or Harry's So-Called Art Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:blankstyle]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
**The Blank Canvas, or Harry's So-Called Art Page**
I mean, //I// call it that.

[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/this-page-intentionally-left-blank/Art.png]]

**[[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/this-page-intentionally-left-blank|More by this author!]]]**
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[div]]

[[div class="imagediv"]]
[[=]]
[[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-7243/Sauelnuesor.jpg link="/SCP-6500" title="SCP-179 from SCP-6500: Inevitable."]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

I, [[*user HarryBlank]], of [http://www.scpwiki.com/this-page-intentionally-left-blank HarryBlank] fame, have accrued a mass of images which technically qualify as "art." 

Here is basically all of it.

**Mouse over anything to find out what it is.** Not on a computer? Here's a neat trick: be on a computer.

**Click on anything that's a thumbnail of a larger picture to go to the larger picture itself.** Unless you've got a thing for thumbnails, I guess, you weirdo.
 
[[=]]
+ Article Icons!
[[/=]]

------

I use these in the infoboxes for my Site-43 stuff, and also on the series not-quite-hub on my author page. Protip: drawing in silhouettes can disguise a lack of talent! I'm the only person on the site doing that, the other silhouette artists are famously incredible. Click these to go to the article they represent.

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Story Sigils!" hide="- NO MORE STORY SIGILS"]]
[[html]]
<br style="line-height: 15px" />
[[/html]]

------
[[div]]
+ SCP Illustrations!
[[/=]]

------

I make composite images for most of my articles, but a few have actual illustrations. These are they.

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Skip Sketches!" hide="- NO MORE SKIP SKETCHES"]]
[[html]]
<br style="line-height: 15px" />
[[/html]]
[[image ThumbDoug.png title="SCP-5056-A on a card depicted in his file and featured in The Significant Others, Part "B."" link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5056/DougCard.png"]][[image ThumbPW.png title="SCP-5109, the "One-Time Password."" link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5109/Mimisi.png"]][[image ThumbPanther.png title="SCP-5494, one of the "Lords of the Beneath World."" link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5494/Panther.jpg"]][[image ThumbMap.png title="The extent of Nexus-94 around Lake Huron." link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5494/Huron.png"]][[image ThumbWashburn.png title="The works of author Hammond Washburn, secretly PoI 382 from SCP-5382." link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5382/Washburn.jpg"]][[image ThumbPolk.png title="Polk the Lazy Cat from SCP-5382." link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5382/Polk.jpg"]][[image Map2.png title="A map of Site-43." link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facility-dossier-site-43/43big.png"]][[image ThumbSkippy.png title="Skippy the Unicorn, who is Sick of Your Shit." link="http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/collab%3Anickthebrick1-harryblank/Skippy.jpg"]]
[[/collapsible]]

------

+ Tale Illustrations!
[[/=]]

Some of these can be quite involved. I do love sinking a ton of time and effort into something most people will never see! TALES ARE PEOPLE TOO, YOU GUYS

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Potboiler Pieces!" hide="- NO MORE POTBOILER PIECES"]]
[[html]]
<br style="line-height: 15px" />
[[/html]]
[[image ThumbAward.png title="Employee of the Month Award featured in The Significant Others, Part "B."" link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-significant-others-part-b/MajorAward.png"]][[image ThumbHide.png title="Splash page for Hide and Seek from, well, "Hide and Seek."" link="http://gurubox.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-2/Togenkyo.png"]][[image ThumbCart.png title="Fake Nintendo 64 cartridge from "Hide and Seek."" link="http://gurubox.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-2/Ikigai.png"]]
[[/collapsible]]

------

+ SCP Composites!
[[/=]]

------

And these are, yeah, like the title says. The composites. Photoshop is fun, yadda yadda. As image sites have lined up to betray me, I have made and re-made several of these several times. They are built out of at least a few images, in each case; some of them are very, //very// involved, with tons of layers and lots of careful blending to achieve the desired effect.

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Anomaly Art!" hide="- NO MORE ANOMALY ART"]]
[[html]]
<br style="line-height: 15px" />
[[/html]]

------

+ Section Icons!
[[/=]]

------

I made these for my Site Dossier. They are the icons for the Operational Sections of Site-43. A few of them incorporate existing site imagery.

------

+ Site Icons!
[[/=]]

------

I made these for my new tale series, [http://www.scpwiki.com/the-time-after-time-password-hub The Time After Time Password]. About half of these Sites get a dedicated tale; the rest of them will have to share. God //damn// are there too many American Sites!

------

+ Logo Stuff!
[[/=]]

------

I have made up logos for things! These are those logos. There will be more. I use the Pride logo on all my Site-43 articles and tales; if it breaks your immersion, please let me know and I'll have the characters reference it approvingly in-universe to drive you away completely.

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Society Stamps! " hide="- NO MORE SOCIETY STAMPS"]]
[[html]]
<br style="line-height: 15px" />
[[/html]]
[[image FEC.png title="The Foundation Elimination Coalition, from the "Old Foes" splinter canon of Resurrection."]][[image ETTRA.png title="The SCP Foundation Emergent Threat Tactical Response Authority (ETTRA) from the "Old Foes" splinter canon of Resurrection."]][[image 43.png title="Lake Huron Research and Containment Site-43."]][[image 43pride.png title="Site-43 Pride logo."]][[image CLIO.png title="Historical Research Group CLIO-4 from "Dead Dogs, Magic Mounties.""]][[image AAG.png title="The Acroamatic Abatement Group from "Dead Dogs, Magic Mounties.""]][[image OSAT.png title="The Occult and Supernatural Activity Taskforce of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police from "Dead Dogs, Magic Mounties.""]][[image CI.png title="The Chaos Insurgency, my interpretation of this very dated logo, used in "Meanwhile, in Australia.""]]
[[<]]
Nobody's asked, but: the weird blob in the Site-43 logo is Lake Huron. The weird spiky red thing that shows up occasionally is a plant we've pressed into patriotic service against its will. And the Chaos Insurgency logo is an attempt to overcome the overpowering MSPAINT vibes of the original.
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
------

+ Asterisks!

------
[[/=]]

I use these to separate paragraphs in tales. They're fun. They're also mostly adapted from other people's work; the Site-43, ETTRA, S&C Plastics and Togenkyo ones are not.

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Tiny Things!" hide="- NO MORE TINY THINGS"]]
[[html]]
<br style="line-height: 15px" />
[[/html]]
[[image A43.png title="Site-43."]] [[image AETTRA.png title="ETTRA."]] [[image SH.png title="The Serpent's Hand."]] [[image TF.png title="The Factory."]] [[image HI.png title="The Horizon Initiative."]] [[image ACI.png title="The Chaos Insurgency."]] [[image SC.png title="S&C Plastics."]] [[image BE.png title="Beyond Entropy, Korean branch."]] [[image TO.png title="Togenkyo. You don't know what that is yet."]] [[image MCD.png title="Marshall, Carter and Dark."]]
[[/collapsible]]
------

+ ACS Stuff!
[[/=]]
------

I like ACS, and I like esoteric classes, but I don't always like the icons I can find for esoteric classes. When that happens, I try my hand at making my own. Like it? Yoink it.

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Subtle Symbols! " hide="- NO MORE SUBTLE SYMBOLS"]]

[[image Eparch.png title="Eparch." link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/blank-art/eparch-icon.svg"]][[image Terminal.png title="Terminal." link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/blank-art/terminal-icon.svg"]][[image Antithesis.png title="Antithesis." link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/blank-art/antithesis-icon.svg"]][[image Memet.png title="Memet." link="http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/blank-art/memet-icon.svg"]]

[[/=]]
[[<]]
Eparch-class objects are non-anomalous, but have anomalous associations. I've depicted that as lightning striking the same place twice. 

Terminal-class objects are basically afterlives; I think the imagery speaks for itself, as it should.

Antithesis-class objects must be used to prevent their own containment, and the containment of other anomalies. See [[[SCP-5956]]] it you want that to make some sort of sense.

Memet-class objects take care of their own containment.

Click 'em to get .svg files.
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]

------

[[=]]
+ Ugly Stuff!
[[/=]]

------

Here's a look behind the curtain I use to shield my hideous unfinished works from the world while I work to make them hideous finished works.

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Lousy Laundry!" hide="- NO MORE LOUSY LAUNDRY"]]
[[/=]]
[[div]]
[[<]]

[[image PantherUgly.jpg]]

[[div]]
[[<]]
In my defense, I intended it to look that bad. It only needed to have the right rough shape of the cat, the grain and darkness in the final version was always going to obscure most of it.

How 'bout them composites? Here's a look at all the different layers going into the main image for [[[SCP-5243]]], and the finished product. I've had to make this image THREE TIMES.
[[/<]]

[[<]]
Finally, the first pic I drew for the site. A terrible, terrible rendition of Doug. So terrible I've even had a character mock it in-universe.
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="imagediv"]]
[[=]]
[[image DougCard.png]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[<]]
I whipped this up, printed it out, and set up the page image for SCP-5056 in a mad rush. People were already downvoting my first article because they hated the existing image! It was gonna get deleted, I just knew it.

But... I'd rather face deletion than post an article with no page image. And so it goes.

Man, I had no idea how to make the face I'd described not look like a light socket back then.
[[/<]]
